title: STAT+: After shaky years, Mass. life science companies find glimmers of hope
description: After holding its breath for several rough years, Greater Boston’s life sciences sector is cautiously coming up for air.
content: After holding its breath for several rough years, Greater Boston’s life sciences sector is cautiously coming up for air.
